中国的疫情已经好转，本土病例已经出现零增长，需要防范的是外来病例，例如英国和美国，以及其他周边国家。
因为中国采取了非常有效的隔离措施。减慢了病毒传播的速度，让我们的医疗机构可以逐步治疗所有病例。这是其他国家做不到的。所以在其他国家的疫情开始爆发的阶段，中国已经实现本土病例零增长，开始复工复产，向其他国家提供医疗援助。
The outbreak in China has improved, and there has been zero growth in local cases. What needs to be prevented is foreign cases, such as the United Kingdom and the United States, and other neighboring countries.
Because China has adopted very effective isolation measures. Slowing down the spread of the virus and allowing our medical facilities to treat all cases gradually. This is impossible for other countries. Therefore, at the stage when the epidemic situation in other countries began to outbreak, China has achieved zero growth in local cases, started to resume work and resume production, and provided medical assistance to other countries.
